sent.orig: He pleaded guilty [not guilty] to the crime.
sent.trans: 他承认 [不承认] 罪行。

sent.orig: Does not make guilty deed in the daytime, without a guilty conscience, without misgivings.
sent.trans: 日间不作亏心事，半夜敲门不吃惊。

sent.orig: Current, afore-mentioned guilty suspicion average per capita told his guilty fact.
sent.trans: 目前，上述犯罪嫌疑人均交代了自己的犯罪事实。

sent.orig: The court found him guilty (not guilty).
Members of the jury, how do you find the defendant? Guilty or not guilty?
sent.trans: 陪审团成员，你们如何裁决被告？有罪还是无罪？
